alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:02PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Jefferson, eastern Butte, western Clark and northwestern Bingham Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 901 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Lima to 11 miles northwest of Northwest Inl to Central Inl. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwest Inl, Central Inl, Southwest Inl, Big Southern Butte, Lone Pine and Howe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
